name: NATURAL PRODUCTS ASSOCIATION
sampleDescriptions: Lobbied in support of legislation, including S. 1654, to include over-the-counter alphabet vitamins and minerals as qualified medical expenses.
Lobbied in support of S. 1654, legislation to include certain over-the-counter dietary supplement products as qualified medical expenses.
